title: ‘Babysitter, 19, showed girl, 6, porn, then made child perform sex act on her’
text:
Babysitter Erica Charles, right, is accused of showing a six year-old girl porn, then forcing the youngster to perform sex acts on her. She is being held in Pinellas County Jail, right (Pictures: Pinellas County Jail/Google)

A 19 year-old babysitter showed a six year-old girl porn, then made the youngster perform a sex act on her, police say.

Erica Charles reportedly sexually abused the youngster in her care on multiple occasions during August and September 2019.

Charles was arrested in Seminole, Florida, on Monday, hours after cops and social services received a report about her alleged abuse.

Detectives claim Charles showed the girl porn on her phone, then ‘directed (the child) to perform a sex act on her.’

Pinellas County Sheriff’s Office say Charles is also accused of undressing the youngster and sexually abusing her ‘on multiple occasions.’

The suspected pedophile is said to have admitted those claims during an interview.

She has been taken to Pinellas County Jail, and is charged with three counts of sexual battery on a child under 12.

Charles also faces counts of lewd and lascivious molestation and prohibition of certain acts in connection with obscenity.

She is being held without bond.

Pinellas County Sheriff’s Office fear Charles may have abused other victims, and have appealed for anyone with information to come forward.
description: Erica Charles, from Seminole in Florida, is said to have sexually abused the youngster in her care on multiple occasions
